text: 20.17: Sng 22.22; Mt 28.10; Ro 8.29; Ef 1.17; Hi 2.11-12Zisas mbara khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu nan suira havharɨ thari. Gu khaŋ muuŋgi, gu won Ndiar han ndagi fhuvara. Ndu na phorga ruigi gumgir han ŋgɨp khaŋ mbe suaŋri, ‘Gu won Dara gu nden Dara han ndai. Gu wo Fhe Bakɨme gum nde Fhe Bakɨme han ndai.’ ”
